Plot: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.
Title: Chernobyl Diaries
Writer: Oren Peli (screenplay), Carey Van Dyke (screenplay), Shane Van Dyke (screenplay), Oren Peli (story)
Actors: Ingrid Bolsø Berdal, Dimitri Diatchenko, Olivia Taylor Dudley, Devin Kelley
tomatoConsensus: Despite an interesting premise and spooky atmospherics, Chernobyl Diaries is mostly short on suspense and originality.
